text.content:
This guide will show only for Narrators (Gamemasters) & only the first time the world loads.

Click the below buttons and then select 'Import Adventure' to configure this World with the Metanthropes: System Content & Early Access Demo.

@UUID[Compendium.metanthropes.system.Adventure.7rKmFXvGJE8UFv2h]{Install System}

The above button will help you import the System Content, which can then be found under the appropriate tabs.

@UUID[Compendium.metanthropes.demo.Adventure.0vnV6XmnYtvtZ81c]{Install Demo}

The above button will help you import the Demo content into your World, which gives you a new Scene and 4 Actors in the appropriate tabs.

To find out what you can do with this Early Access Demo, please see the 'Early Access Demo' section in the @UUID[Compendium.metanthropes.welcome.dP9LgZVr6QDQrI4K]{Welcome Journal}.

Enjoy!

To automatically show this journal again after the world loads, you can enable the 'Show System Installation Guide' setting that you can find in the 'Game Settings' Tab -> 'Configure Settings' -> 'Metanthropes - Early Access' category.

To open this page again manually, please navigate to the 'Compendium Packs' Tab. From there, navigate to the 'Metanthropes' folder and click to expand it. Select the 'Installation' subfolder and from there you can open the 'Install System' compendium and from there, open the 'Installation Guide' journal page.
